definition.text: Verify that the Charting Space data structures for the corresponding Market were created successfully.

translations.text: Verifica que las estructuras de datos del Charting Space para el mercado correspondiente se crearon con éxito.
Überprüfen Sie, ob die Charting Space Datenstrukturen für den entsprechenden Market erfolgreich erstellt wurden.
İlgili Borsa ( Market ) için Grafik Alanı ( Charting Space ) veri yapılarının başarıyla oluşturulduğunu doğrulayın.
Убедитесь, что структуры данных Charting Space для соответствующего Market были успешно созданы.

paragraphs.text: Look for the following data structures:

translations.text: Busca las siguientes estructuras de datos:
Suchen Sie nach den folgenden Datenstrukturen:

paragraphs.text: A Time Machine node for each trading session created in the Testing Trading Tasks.

translations.text: Un nodo Time Machine para cada Trading Session creada en el Testing Trading Tasks.
Ein Time Machine Knoten für jede Handelssitzung, die in den Testing Trading Tasks erstellt wurde.
Ticaret Görevlerini Test Etme'de ( Testing Trading Tasks ) oluşturulan her Ticaret Oturumu için bir Zaman Makinesi ( Time Machine ) düğümü.
Узел Time Machine для каждой торговой сессии, созданной в Testing Trading Tasks.

paragraphs.text: A Time Machine node for each trading session created in the Production Trading Tasks.

translations.text: Un nodo Time Machine oara cada Trading Session creada en el Production Trading Tasks.
Ein Time Machine Knoten für jede Handelssitzung, die in den Production Trading Tasks erstellt wurde.
Üretim Ticareti Görevlerinde ( Production Trading Tasks ) oluşturulan her ticaret oturumu için bir Zaman Makinesi ( Time Machine ) düğümü.
Узел Time Machine для каждой торговой сессии, созданной в Production Trading Tasks.
